name: Same Difference
description:
After your ship is destroyed by an unknown assailant, you find yourself stranded on an unknown shore with the remaining survivors...

Thanks to your shrewd tongue , you soon become the advisor to the local Count, who recruits your help to seduce the noble lady of his fancy.

Play as the feisty lady pirate Cosara Dubois in a world of love, intrigue, and whimsy!

Current Version: 0.31 - ACT I (50% of branching done, fully voiced) 

5K words total.

Edited by Ruby

Backgrounds by Prydefire

Char Art by Mekhfamph

Music & Sound by Hairbobble

Voice Casting by David Purkey

Narrated by Kelly B Jones

Michelle Geoff as Cosara

Kelly B Jones as Antoinette & Severin

Sean Dickey as Timmy

Cameron Crawford as Emillion

Vera Tan as Yennefer

Hamish Plaggemars as Benedik

Oliver Smith as Octavio

Paul Greene-Dennis as Sixten

Gina Moravec as Victoria

Ren'Py GUI Template "Disco Framework" by Katy133
